personas.name: Marketing Agencies
personas.description: Organizations that manage marketing for other businesses
pain_points: Wasting time on repetitive tasks or manual processes
Inconsistent lead generation and sales follow-ups
Weak data visibility across tools and platforms
No unified system for marketing, sales, and automation
High costs hiring teams to manage simple workflows
